title: Morris Family Chiropractic - Chiropractor in Defuniak Springs, FL
description: Morris Family Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Defuniak Springs serving all of your needs. Call us today at (850) 892-4636 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
